about_the_game:
The Gates Of Midgård Challenge Pack!


Three new Challenges - introducing environmental dangers to Magicka 2's Challenge Maps! Hordes of bloodthirsty enemies pour out from mysterious gates in the North, South and East, each with unique environmental dangers! One of the Challenges is truly a challenge – Bragging rights included!
detailed_description:
The Gates Of Midgård Challenge Pack!


Three new Challenges - introducing environmental dangers to Magicka 2's Challenge Maps! Hordes of bloodthirsty enemies pour out from mysterious gates in the North, South and East, each with unique environmental dangers! One of the Challenges is truly a challenge – Bragging rights included!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Windows 8
  • Processor: CPU: 3GHz Dual Core (Intel Pentium G3220 or higher / AMD A4-4000 or higher)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 550 or better / ATI Radeon HD 5850 or better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Windows 8
  • Processor: 2.8GHz Quad Core (Intel Core i5-2300 or higher / AMD A8-3850 or higher)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 640 or better / ATI Radeon HD 6670 or better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

One of the Challenges is truly a challenge – Bragging rights included!
